headline: Globe Life (GL): Exploring If Recent Share Price Dip Presents a Value Opportunity
summary: Globe Life (GL) shares have slipped by about 1% over the past day and 4% in the past week. Investors may be weighing recent performance against the company’s solid returns over the past year and favorable long-term trajectory. See our latest analysis for Globe Life. Despite a recent dip, Globe Life’s 1-year total shareholder return still sits at a sturdy 34%. This highlights long-term strength even as near-term share price momentum fades a bit. Investors seem to be factoring in both growth...

headline: Here's What to Expect From Globe Life’s Next Earnings Report
summary: Globe Life's third-quarter earnings are due out at the end of the month, with the consensus forecast pointing to a double-digit jump in profitability.
